entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to a few flurries and ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
